articles.content: OMAHA, Neb. Among the thousands of out-of-town visitors who departed Charles Schwab Field late Friday after a classic nightcap in the College World Series, it was difficult to imagine two people head… [+4854 chars]

articles.author: Jared Schwartz
articles.title: Cardinals' Steven Matz regrets that ‘special’ Mets staff failed to flourish - New York Post
articles.description: The 32-year-old Steven Matz, in his second season with the Cardinals, returned to his old stomping grounds of Citi Field on Friday night.
articles.content:
There was a sense of both nostalgia and regret in Steven Matzs voice as he reminisced about all that couldve been.
